attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a student currently on a pgce course and i am shocked by the abmount of work teachers do and some of the abuse they have to put up with. having just finished university and in major debt i petition that teachers should get a pay rise so they can buy a house or a car not that they could spend it beccause of the amount of work they have to do after hours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
